definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 场景从17世纪景观作为田园场景复制画。

sentences.english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.
sentences.chinese: 表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光。

sentences.english: The day before we went to class in Guangxi countryside, Quzhai a strawberry.
sentences.chinese: 前天我们班集体去了八桂田园，去摘了草莓。

sentences.english: A mother's love is like a pastoral poem, you are far from pure, and elegant light.
sentences.chinese: 母爱就象一首田园诗，幽远纯净，和雅清淡。

sentences.english: Artistically, it reflects a delicate and significant style of pastoral poetry.
sentences.chinese: 在艺术上体现出一种清新隽永的田园诗的风格。

sentences.english: Changning shows pastoral scenery and human landscape.
sentences.chinese: 展示了昌宁的山水田园风光及人文风貌。

sentences.english: Wangwei was a famous pastoral poet of landscape.
sentences.chinese: 王维是盛唐时期著名的山水田园诗人。

sentences.english: The past country estate is yet their warm homestead today.
sentences.chinese: 往日的田园依旧是今日温馨家园。

sentences.english: The rurality of the small village I am living is very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 我居住的那个小村庄的田园风光非常漂亮。

sentences.english: Of course, life in this idyllic town comes at a cost.
sentences.chinese: 当然，生活在这样一个田园般的城镇也要付出代价。

sentences.english: Since the late Tang and Northern Song Dynasties, people have begun to call Wei Yingwu the poet of landscape and pastoral.
sentences.chinese: 自唐末北宋以来，人们开始称韦应物为山水田园诗人。

sentences.english: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picure.
sentences.chinese: 但这种田园诗般的乡村风光只汪是一个侧面而已。

sentences.english: Eclogue No. 2, for piano in D major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴而作的第2田园诗曲。

sentences.english: Grilled chicken with special mushroom sauce, served with butter rice and fresh garden salad.
sentences.chinese: 香烤鸡块伴特制蘑菇酱，配有油饭和新鲜田园沙拉。

sentences.english: Greg home every room hung with rich rural colorific adornment.
sentences.chinese: 格雷格家每个房间都挂着具有浓郁田园色彩的装饰画。

sentences.english: Eclogue No. 3, for piano in G major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴而作的第3田园诗曲。

definition: Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan/Taoyuan township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei/Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
